name: SmartHealthConnect
description: A comprehensive healthcare integration app that connects to SMART on FHIR electronic health records. View patient health summaries, check drug interactions, find specialists, search clinical trials, and explore medical research.

privacy_policies.description: Privacy policy for handling health data

tools.name: health_summary
tools.title: Health Summary
tools.description: View comprehensive patient health summary including conditions, vitals, medications, and allergies.

tools.name: care_gaps
tools.title: Care Gaps
tools.description: View preventive care gap recommendations based on HEDIS quality measures.

tools.name: drug_interactions
tools.title: Drug Interaction Checker
tools.description: Check drug interactions for a medication using OpenFDA data.

tools.name: find_specialists
tools.title: Find Specialists
tools.description: Search for healthcare specialists by specialty and location using the NPI Registry.

tools.name: clinical_trials
tools.title: Clinical Trials
tools.description: Search for clinical trials by condition using ClinicalTrials.gov.

tools.name: research_insights
tools.title: Research Insights
tools.description: Find recent research preprints from bioRxiv/medRxiv for a medical condition.

test_credentials.description: Demo mode is enabled by default. No credentials required.
test_credentials.instructions: The app automatically connects to demo FHIR data when the backend is running at http://localhost:5000
